1.title: Joel Schumacher
1.plot: One on one interview with director Joel Schumacher on his career in cinema from costumer to screenwriter and finally as director detailing his role as a filmmaker and the obstacles he's faced.

2.title: Richard Donner
2.plot: Casual, one sided interview with director/producer Richard Donner detailing his cinematic output, from being upgraded from second unit to director of his first film until his then current, now last, film ("16 BLOCKS") and his frustration with it's lack of advertising.

3.title: Andrew Davis
3.plot: Ex-Cinematographer Andrew Davis sits down for a one sided interview about his work as a director and how his early life as a journalist has shaped his mostly action movies.

4.title: Jan de Bont
4.plot: Ex-cinematographer Jan de Bont is featured in this one on one interview program about his directing career from his debut "SPEED" and his continuing preference for blockbuster movies.
